default.question: WHAT IS GENETIC TESTING?
default.answer: Genetic testing involves examining your DNA, the chemical data base that carries instructions for your body’s functions. Genetic testing can reveal changes or alterations, called mutations, in your genes that may lead to illness or disease. (Source: Mayo Clinic)
